.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Consumption.Models.ReservationSummaries> List(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Consumption.IReservationsSummariesOperations operations, string scope, string grain, string filter) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function List (operations As IReservationsSummariesOperations, scope As String, grain As String, Optional filter As String = null) As IEnumerable(Of ReservationSummaries)
static member List : Microsoft.Azure.Management.Consumption.IReservationsSummariesOperations * string * string * string -> seq<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Consumption.Models.ReservationSummaries>

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.

The scope of the reservation summaries. The scope can be 'providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationorders/{ReservationOrderId}' or 'providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationorders/{ReservationOrderId}/reservations/{ReservationId}'
Can be daily or monthly. Possible values include: 'DailyGrain', 'MonthlyGrain'
Required only for daily grain. The properties/UsageDate for start date and end date. The filter supports 'le' and 'ge'
Docs.summary: Lists the reservations summaries for daily or monthly grain.
